channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How to Find, Evaluate, and Offer on Rental Properties in 2024
item.description: Want financial freedom through real estate? Then, you’ll need to know how to buy a rental property. Don’t worry; even as a beginner, you can take three basic steps to […]

item.title: India’s WazirX confirms security breach following a $230M ‘suspicious transfer’
item.description: The Mumbai-based firm said one of its multisig wallets had suffered a security breach, and it was temporarily pausing all withdrawals from the platform. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Meet the New Generation of Unarmed First Responders in this New Podcast Series.
item.description: “The Fifth Branch,” a podcast from The Marshall Project and Tradeoffs, examines new, alternative ways to respond to 911 crisis calls.

item.title: These Are the Passive Investments I’m Most Excited About Right Now
item.description: With so many ways to invest in real estate today, finding the right path for you can be tough. Take a look at what Brian is considering.

item.title: Samsung to acquire UK-based knowledge graph startup Oxford Semantic Technologies
item.description: The Korean tech giant is acquiring Oxford Semantic Technologies, a U.K.-based knowledge graph startup that has built an AI reasoning engine. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: What We Know From Sen. J.D. Vance’s Legislative Action on Criminal Justice Issues
item.description: On immigration and criminal justice, Vance has defended and legislated former President Donald Trump’s policy goals.

item.title: Loan Modifications Are Bringing 3% Interest Rates Back, Even for Residential Real Estate
item.description: Yes, investment properties can qualify for the program if they meet certain requirements.

item.title: Artificial Agency raises $16M to use AI to make NPCs feel more realistic in video games
item.description: A team of former Google DeepMind researchers are betting that their unique behavior engine for NPCs will make games more fun and dynamic. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: How a Supreme Court Ruling Could Affect a Case Involving Police Abuse of Youth
item.description: Another court must now decide how the landmark ruling will impact the Boy Scouts abuse settlement, which involves victims of police sexual abuse.

item.title: Biden Proposes Rent Increase Limits, With Penalties for Landlords Who Don’t Listen
item.description: Also in the proposal is a push for 15,000 affordable housing units and increased development in Las Vegas.

item.title: Israel’s startup scene shows reslience despite nine months of war
item.description: When the war between Israel and Hamas broke out last October, we examined its potential impact on the tech ecosystems in Israel and Palestine. Nine months later, the prevailing sentiment in Israel, based on my conversation with founders and investors, is that the conflict has made the startup and VC ecosystem more resilient, especially its […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Jackson, Mississippi, Wants Curfew Centers to Cut Crime. Here’s What Other Cities Learned.
item.description: After a teen’s murder, city officials hope a curfew and youth centers will get kids off the street. Young people are skeptical.

item.title: The Million-Dollar Real Estate Business YOU Can Start Today with Just $150
item.description: Starting a real estate business is one of the best ways to achieve financial freedom, replace your W2 income, and leave your nine-to-five. Why? Because you don’t need a ton […]

item.title: Deel acquires Hofy to build its own IT device management service
item.description: Both of Hofy's co-founders, Sami Bouremoum and Michael Ginzo, along with the rest of the startup's leadership team and 120 employees, are joining Deel to build Deel IT. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Love Beyond Bars: Miguel and Silvia
item.description: While Miguel Solorio did 25 years for a crime he didn’t commit, his wife, Silvia, was right by his side. Here’s their California love story in pictures.
